message: I don't really understand why I need a sign-up page after I sign in with twitter. I don't want to have a separate password.

I suspect Convore wants you to have a separate login from Twitter and Facebook, and it doesn't have access to Twitter's password, even when you athorize access. I've been thinking about this for a site of my own actually, and it could make creating a dedicated account optional (accessible from the account settings preferences) and by default simply create a Twitter/FB auth only one.
I like the idea of prompting for the username right away, however. I use joostschuur for Twitter and 'major' sites now, but the shorter jschuur for everything else.
